message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but you get a decent share. We can work something out if you want to continue playing.
That's not a fair start, Alice. I'm proposing a more balanced split. Let's be reasonable and avoid the clock.
I'm willing to compromise. This offer is more balanced than your last one, and we can still both get a good amount. Let's avoid the risk of losing everything.
We're getting close, Alice. I'm showing you I'm willing to compromise, but this needs to be more equitable for us both. Time is running out.
